Name: Aurigan Coalition Military
Details: The Aurigan Coalition Military, or ACM, is the military branch of the Aurigan Coalition and was formed out of the remnants of High Lady Kamea Arano's Aurigan Restoration campaign. The ACM, while small and critically undersupplied, nevertheless takes great pride in the defense of the Aurigan realm and prides itself on doing the best they can with the little they have available.
